text: The Curse of La Llorona is an American supernatural horror movie. It was directed by Michael Chaves. It was written by Mikki Daughtry and Tobias Iaconis. James Wan produced the movie. It stars Linda Cardellini, Raymond Cruz, Patricia Vel√°squez, Marisol Ramirez, Sean Patrick Thomas and Tony Amendola as Father Perez. This movie is the sixth installment in The Conjuring Universe. It is based on the Mexican folk tale La Llorona. The movie was released on April 19, 2019 by Warner Bros. Pictures and New Line Cinema. ==References== Category:2019 horror movies Category:2010s supernatural movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:American horror movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: The Curse of La Llorona
